S02n205:2: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān vajreṣu viharati sma |
S02n205:3: sarvaśarīraṃ vajramayamadhiṣṭhāya vajrapāṇiśca buddhānubhāvena vajrasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ |
S02n205:4: tato vajrapāṇiḥ [sarva] buddhānubhāvena sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ [sarvabodhisattvādhiṣṭhā] nañca mahākrodhasambhūtaṃ vajrasāramabhāṣate sma |
S02n205:5: acchedyamabhedyaṃ satyaṃ dṛḍhaṃ sthiraṃ sarvatrāpratihataṃ sarvatrāparājitaṃ sarvasattvavidrāvaṇakaraṃ sarvasattvotsādanakaraṃ sarvavidyācchedanakaraṃ sarvavidyāstambhanakaraṃ sarvakarmavidhvaṃsanakaraṃ sarvakarmavidrāvaṇakaraṃ sarvagrahotsādanakaraṃ sarvagrahavimokṣaṇakaraṃ sarvabhūtākarṣaṇakaraṃ [sarvabhūtanigrahaṇakaraṃ] sarvavidyāmantrakarmaparāyaṇakaraṃ asiddhānāṃ siddhakaraṃ siddhānāñcāvināśanakaraṃ [sarvakāmapradānakaraṃ] sarvasattvānāṃ rakṣaṇakaraṃ śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ sarvasattvānāñca stambhanakaraṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca mohanakaram imaṃ mantraṃ mahāvalaṃ buddhānubhāvena yakṣendro vajrapāṇiḥ pratyabhāṣat |
S02n205:9: tadyathā - om truṭa truṭa troṭaya troṭaya sfuṭa sfuṭa sfoṭaya sfoṭaya ghurṇa ghurṇa ghurṇāpaya ghurṇāpaya sarvasattvānāṃ vibodhaya vibodhaya sambodhaya sambodhaya bhrama bhrama saṃbhrāmaya saṃbhrāmaya sarvabhūtāni kuṭa kuṭa saṃkuṭaya saṃkuṭaya sarvaśatrūn ghaṭa ghaṭa saṃdhāṭaya saṃghāṭaya sarvavidyā vajra vajra sphoṭaya vajra vajra kaṭa vajra vajra maṭa vajra vajra matha vajra vajra aṭṭahāsanīlavajrasuvajrāya svāhā |
S02n205:10: om he fullu nirufullu nigṛhṇa kullu mili cullu kuru kullu vajravijayāya svāhā |
S02n205:12: om kaṭa kaṭa maṭa maṭa raṭa raṭa moṭana pramoṭanāya svāhā |
S02n205:13: om cara nicara hara hara sara sara māraya vajravidāraṇāya svāhā |
S02n205:14: om chinda chinda bhinda bhinda mahākilikīlāya svāhā |
S02n205:15: om bandha bandha krodha krodha vajrakilikīlāya svāhā |
S02n205:20: om matisthiravajra śrutisthiravajra pratisthiravajra mahāvajra apratihatavajra amoghavajra aihivajra śīghraṃ vajrāya svāhā |
S02n205:21: om dhara dhara dhiri dhiri dhuru dhuru sarvavajrakulamāvartāya svāhā |
S02n205:24: sarvabalamāvartaya mahābale kaṭabale tatale acale maṇḍalamaye ativajra mahābale vegaraṇa ajite jvala jvala tiṭi tiṭi ti(piṃ)
S02n205:25: ṅgale daha daha tejovati tili tili bandha bandha mahābale vajrāṅkuśajvālāya svāhā |
S02n205:28: tadyathā - om hara hara vajra matha matha vajra dhuna dhuna vajra daha daha vajra paca paca vajra dhara dhara vajra dhāraya dhāraya vajra dāruṇa dāruṇa vajra chinda chinda vajra bhinda bhinda vajra hū phaṭ |
S02n205:30: om hulu hulu tiṣṭha tiṣṭha bandha bandha hana hana amṛte hū phaṭ |
S02n205:45: te ca sarve ca duṣṭātmā upasargā sudāruṇāḥ ||
S02n205:50: ghaṭaṃ tu rajataṃ cāpi śucivastreṇa vāsitam |
S02n205:52: japedvidāraṇaṃ mantraṃ yaḥ snāyāt pārthivaḥ sadā |
S02n205:53: evaṃ yaḥkurute nityaṃ tasya sampadyate śubham ||
S02n205:54: idamavocad bhagavānāttamanāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti |
